using UnityEngine;
//Replace the "FillInType" with the event you want to create
//If you want to create a object with handle in preview, please inherit the "AbilityEventObj" with "AbilityEventObj_CreateObjWithHandle"

namespace CombatEditor
{
[AbilityEvent]
[CreateAssetMenu(menuName = "AbilityEvents / FillInType")]
public class AbilityEventObj_FillInType: AbilityEventObj
{
    //Write the data you need here.
    public override EventTimeType GetEventTimeType()
    {
        return FillInTimeType;
    }
    public override AbilityEventEffect Initialize()
    {
        return new AbilityEventEffect_FillInType(this);
    }
	#if UNITY_EDITOR
	public override AbilityEventPreview InitializePreview()
    {
        return new AbilityEventPreview_FillInType(this);
    }
	#endif
}

//Write you logic here
public partial class AbilityEventEffect_FillInType : AbilityEventEffect
{
        public override void StartEffect()
        {
            base.StartEffect();
        }

        public override void EffectRunning(float currentTimePercentage)
        {
            base.EffectRunning(currentTimePercentage);
        }

        protected override void EndEffect()
        {
            base.EndEffect();
        }
}

public partial class AbilityEventEffect_FillInType : AbilityEventEffect
{
    private AbilityEventObj_FillInType EventObj {get;set;}
    public AbilityEventEffect_FillInType(AbilityEventObj initObj) : base(initObj)
    {
        m_EventObj = initObj;
        EventObj = (AbilityEventObj_FillInType)initObj;
    }
}
}
